description: Header file defining utility functions for file synchronization and persistence in JSON format within the Utils namespace.
external_files: <json related classes or headers not explicitly specified but used in code>

methods.name: void syncPersistFile(const string file)
methods.description: Synchronizes the specified file to disk by opening the file, flushing buffers, calling fsync, and closing it.

methods.name: void persistJsonSettings(const string strFile,const string strKey,const JsonValue & jsValue)
methods.description: Persists a JSON setting to a file by reading existing content, updating with new key-value pair, writing back, and syncing to disk.

ctags.name: persistJsonSettings
ctags.pattern: /^inline void persistJsonSettings(const string strFile, const string strKey, const JsonValue& jsVa/
ctags.signature: (const string strFile,const string strKey,const JsonValue & jsValue)
